#summary Class diagram of muduo network library.

http://muduo.googlecode.com/files/muduo_class_diagram.png

= Class Diagram =

== User visible classes ==
  * EventLoop is a reactor.
  * TcpConnection is an _established_ TCP connection.
  * TcpConnection has two Buffer(s), one for input, the other for output
  * TcpClient
  * TcpServer

== Internal classes ==
  * Acceptor, owned and used by TcpServer.
  * Connector, owned and used by TcpClient.
  * Poller, base class, owned and used by EventLoop
